POST /api/auth/signup.description: creates a new users in the database after going through firebase authentication

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users and user count

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a user object by username

PATCH /api/users/:username.description: updates user first_name, last_name or email

DELETE /api/users/:username.description: deletes a user by their username

GET /api/locations.description: serves up locations in the database

POST /api/locations.description: creates a new location and serves it up

GET /api/locations/:location_id/reviews.description: serves up an array of reviews for given location

POST /api/reviews.description: creates a new review for a location

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: updates a review for a given location

examplePatchRequest.review_title: An amazing city with brilliant views

DELETE /api/reviews/:review_id.description: removes a review from the database

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: returns an array of comments for a specific review
